argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sectepi.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | sectepi.e | |- E = ( Epi ` C ) |
| 3 |  | sectepi.s | |- S = ( Sect ` C ) |
| 4 |  | sectepi.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 5 |  | sectepi.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | sectepi.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | sectepi.1 | |- ( ph -> F ( X S Y ) G ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppCat ` C ) = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_oppcbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) = ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) = ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 12 | 8 | #P_oppccat | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( oppCat ` C ) e. Cat ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( oppCat ` C ) e. Cat ) |
| 14 | 1, 8, 4, 5, 6, 3, 11 | #P_oppcsect | |- ( ph -> ( G ( X ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) Y ) F <-> F ( X S Y ) G ) ) |
| 15 | 7, 14 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> G ( X ( Sect ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) Y ) F ) |
| 16 | 9, 10, 11, 13, 5, 6, 15 | #P_sectmon | |- ( ph -> G e. ( X ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) Y ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 4, 10, 2 | #P_oppcmon | |- ( ph -> ( X ( Mono ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) Y ) = ( Y E X ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ph -> G e. ( Y E X ) ) |
